scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Sarah Obsesses over Books & Cookies
scrape.text: The first 20 pages I was like, wow this is so cool. Then by page 100 all i can think of is that it's a pretentious piece of boring crap. That sounds really bad. I respect that it's a book and that the author worked hard on it and that other people loved it, gillian flynn blurbed it. but it wasn't for me. so, herman i bid you adieu.
